trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, Vandara deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Vandara that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Vandara doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of her turns, Vandara can use a bonus action to take the {@action dash||Dash}, {@action disengage||Disengage}, or {@action hide||Hide} action.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Vandara is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Vandara instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: Vandara halves the damage that she takes from an attack that hits her. Vandara must be able to see the attacker.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Vandara makes two melee or ranged weapon attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: +1 Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.
{@bold {@italic Purpose.}} Lead a resistance against the encroaching goblinoids and train the players.
{@bold {@italic Trait.}} I am prejudiced towards men, and don't respect them as much as women. (Flaw)
